articles.author: Pihu Yadav
articles.title: AI powered microscope installed in Odisha district to detect malaria - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The microscope, developed by a startup from the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay, easily differentiates between two malaria parasites — P falciparum and P vivax.

articles.author: Tassilo Hummel, Marine Strauss
articles.title: Belgium questions Apple's iPhone 12 after France suspends sales over radiation - Reuters
articles.description: Belgium said on Thursday it would review potential health risks linked to Apple's iPhone 12, raising the prospect that more European countries might ban the model after France ordered a <a href="/technology/why-has-france-banned-sales-apples-iphone-12-2023-09…
